values.code: findNearestTouchable(root: ViewGroup!, x: Int, y: Int, direction: Int, deltas: IntArray!)
values.desc: Find the nearest touchable view to the specified view.

values.code: findNextFocus(root: ViewGroup!, focused: View!, direction: Int)
values.desc: Find the next view to take focus in root's descendants, starting from the view that currently is focused.

values.code: findNextFocusFromRect(root: ViewGroup!, focusedRect: Rect!, direction: Int)
values.desc: Find the next view to take focus in root's descendants, searching from a particular rectangle in root's coordinates.

values.code: findNextKeyboardNavigationCluster(root: View, currentCluster: View?, direction: Int)
values.desc: Find the root of the next keyboard navigation cluster after the current one.
